attributes.action: Make Animal cruelty a criminal offence with a harsh prison. Sentence
attributes.additional_details: All over the web and the papers and I have seen and witnessed a man being cruel to a dog I intervene and took the dog into our care and I had to hold my anger back this has to change and change now
attributes.background: Any body who does Any sort of Animal cruelty should not be given a suspended sentence and should be charged with Animal cruelty a tough prison sentence should be imposed. I run Animals of Hope in Redruth Cornwall and we take in dogs that have been mistreated in a bad way and rehabilitate them
